article:
The 'video game industry' (sometimes referred to as the interactive
entertainment industry) is the economic sector involved with the development,
marketing and sales of video games. It encompasses dozens of job disciplines and
employs thousands of people worldwide. Zackariasson, P. and Wilson, T.L.
eds. (2012). The Video Game Industry: Formation, Present State, and Future. New
York: Routledge.
categories: Video game industry| Computer and video game industry
headings: Latest trends in the game industry
